channel.title: Adding exp [EASY]
channel.description:
Hey mopar, I have a quick question. When I kill a NPC how do I make it give me XP. I am using a delta source for learning. Lets say I want to kill a chicken, and when I kill it, how would I make it give me herblore exp? that is just an example.
Thanks guys.

item.title: Adding exp [EASY]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

I found this on google, I think you should put this in your applydead method in your npc handling class. Sorry I’m not good with delta.

Obviously you have to change the “npcidhere” and “exphere” and “skillid”.

if (NPCID == npcidhere) { addSkillXP(exphere*playerLevel[skillid], skillid); }

Read full topic
